plot: A triptych of short, cubist character studies. They are inspired by cubism, W.S. Burroughs, and the paintings of Francis Bacon.
title: A Sentimental Conversation
plot_es: A triptych of short, cubist character studies. They are inspired by cubism, W.S. Burroughs, and the paintings of Francis Bacon.
plot_en: A triptych of short, cubist character studies. They are inspired by cubism, W.S. Burroughs, and the paintings of Francis Bacon.
